titles.title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to clarify requirements with respect to the purchase of domestic commodities and products by school food authorities in Puerto Rico under the school lunch and breakfast programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/19/2002--Introduced. Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to specify that certain Buy American requirements apply to the purchase of domestic commodities and products by school food authorities in Puerto Rico, for the school lunch program under such Act and the school breakfast program under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966.
